text_blocks.content: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR DATE M. OF PHONE AREA CODE NUMBER EXTENSION TELEPHONED PLEASE CALL CAME TO SEE YOU WILL CALL AGAIN WANTS TO SEE YOU RUSH RETURNED YOUR CALL SPECIAL ATTENTION MESSAGE SIGNED

additional_notes: Four message slips with handwritten notes. The document appears to be a scanned copy of a notebook page with four message slips filled out.
